channel.title: CW IW doesn't stop Pos attack
channel.description:
[Image of successful IW, and the death of the IW target](https://imgur.com/a/xEmyN)
I assume IW is supposed to stop a Pos attack.
To reproduce: as CW, ice ward a target, and have a possessor possess you and attack the warded target, all on the same night.
Having asked the possessor in game, I got confirmation that I was indeed possessed to attack the target I was warding.
